remarks.format: ## Remarks ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

param.name: queryOrClassName
param.span: 要在查詢中使用的完整查詢或類別名稱。

span.span: The entire query or the class name to use in the query.

param.span: 在這個類別中的剖析器 (Parser) 會嘗試將字串剖析為有效的 WQL SELECT 查詢。

span.span: The parser in this class attempts to parse the string as a valid WQL SELECT query.

param.span: 如果剖析器無法完成，會假設字串為類別名稱。

span.span: If the parser is unsuccessful, it assumes the string is a class name.

summary.span: 初始化指定查詢或指定類別名稱的 類別新執行個體。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ClassName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ClassName : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要在查詢選取的類別名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the class name to be selected from in the query.

value.span: 傳回 值，內含查詢中的類別名稱。

span.span: Returns a value containing the name of the class in the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存之物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的類別名稱。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new class name. 值**ClassName**屬性會取代\<類別名稱 > 格式的 SELECT 查詢中的項目 」 選取 \* FROM\<類別名稱 > 其中\<條件 > 」。A value for the **ClassName** property would replace the \ item in a SELECT query of the form "SELECT \* FROM \ WHERE \". ## 屬性值Property Value 字串，表示在查詢中的類別名稱。A string representing the name of the class in the query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化藉由指定查詢，然後變更屬性。The following example initializes a by specifying a query and then changes the property. [!code-csharp[wminet_SelectQuery_ClassName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_SelectQuery_ClassName/cs/SelectQuery_ClassName.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_SelectQuery_ClassName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_SelectQuery_ClassName/vb/SelectQuery_ClassName.vb#1)]

member this.Condition : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定在 SELECT 查詢中要套用的條件。

span.span: Gets or sets the condition to be applied in the SELECT query.

value.span: 傳回 值，內含要套用至 SELECT 查詢的條件。

span.span: Returns a value containing the condition to be applied to the SELECT query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存之物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的條件。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new condition. 值**條件**屬性會取代\<條件 > 形式的 SELECT 查詢中的項目 」 選取 \* FROM\<類別名稱 > 其中\<條件 > 」。A value for the **Condition** property would replace the \ item in a SELECT query of the form "SELECT \* FROM \ WHERE \". ## 屬性值Property Value 字串，包含要在選取的查詢中套用的條件。A string containing the condition to be applied in the SELECT query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IsSchemaQuery { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsSchemaQuery : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出這個查詢是否為結構描述查詢或執行個體查詢。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this query is a schema query or an instances query.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出查詢是否為結構描述查詢。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the query is a schema query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存之物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的查詢類型。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new query type. ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果應評估這項查詢，透過結構描述;`false`如果應評估查詢，透過執行個體。`true` if this query should be evaluated over the schema; `false` if the query should be evaluated over instances. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

Public Overrides Property QueryString As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ QueryString { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.QueryString : string with get, set

summary.span: 在 物件中取得或設定字串格式的查詢。

span.span: Gets or sets the query in the object, in string form.

value.span: 傳回包含查詢的 值。

span.span: Returns a value containing the query.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存之物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 此外，設定這個屬性會導致其他物件的成員更新時在剖析的字串。In addition, setting this property causes the other members of the object to be updated when the string is reparsed. ## 屬性值Property Value 字串，表示查詢。A string representing the query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會初始化使用此預設建構函式，然後變更屬性。The following example initializes a with the default constructor and then changes the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存之物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的屬性。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new properties. 值**SelectedProperties**屬性會取代\<屬性 > 形式的 SELECT 查詢中的項目 」 選取\<屬性 > FROM\<類別名稱 > 其中\<條件 > 」。A value for the **SelectedProperties** property would replace the \ item in a SELECT query of the form "SELECT \ FROM \ WHERE \". ## 屬性值Property Value A包含要在查詢中選取之屬性的名稱。A containing the names of the properties to be selected in the query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
